00185     struct FileSegment {
00187         SegmentId segmentId;
00189         void *handle;
00190 
00192         FileSegment() : segmentId(0), handle(NULL) { }
00193     };
00194 
00197     struct FileSegmentCompare {
00199         bool operator()(const FileSegment &fs1, const FileSegment &fs2) const
00200               { return fs1.segmentId < fs2.segmentId; }
00201     };
00202 
00204     typedef std::set<FileSegment, FileSegmentCompare> FileList;
00206     typedef std::set<FileSegment, FileSegmentCompare>::iterator FileListIterator;
00208     FileList openFiles;
00209 
00211     char fileName[1000];
00214     Uint32 segmentOffset;
00215 
00217     DbjFileManager() : openFiles(), segmentOffset(0) { }
00219     ~DbjFileManager();
00220 
00229     bool exists(const char *fileName) const;
00230 
00248     const char *getFileName(const SegmentId segmentId);
00249 
00261     FileListIterator const findFileInList(const SegmentId segmentId)
00262           {
00263               FileSegment info;
00264               info.segmentId = segmentId;
00265               return openFiles.find(info);
00266           }
00267 
00277     void *getFileHandle(const SegmentId segmentId)
00278           {
00279               FileListIterator iter = findFileInList(segmentId);
00280               if (iter == openFiles.end()) {
00281                   return NULL;
00282               }
00283               return iter->handle;
00284           }
